attributes.action: sex offenders serving in the armed services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was surprised and shocked to discover that the Ministry of Defence has admitted there are 32 sex offenders serving in Britain's armed services. apparently they are permitted to remain providing their offences don't merit a prison sentence! The civilian populace in the world trouble spots, where our armed forces serve, have enough to worry about without thinking that some paedophile serviceman might molest their children!
